string.name: cat_progress_indicator_title
string.description: Title for the screen that showcases demonstrative usages of the MaterialProgressIndicator widget [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_progress_indicator_demo_indeterminate_title
string.description: Title of demo for the progress indicators in indeterminate mode [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_progress_indicator_demo_determinate_title
string.description: Title of demo for the progress indicators in determinate mode [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_progress_indicator_demo_standalone_title
string.description: Title of demo for other components using progress indicator standalone drawables [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_progress_indicator_description
string.description: Body text describing the MaterialProgressIndicator widget within the design system [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: ProgressIndicator shows the progress of an undergoing process. It can represent a determinate or indeterminate process in linear or circular form.

string.name: cat_progress_indicator_indeterminate_to_determinate_explanation
string.description: Body text describing how progress indicators can go from indeterminate to determinate [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: As more information about a process becomes available, a progress indicator can switch from an indeterminate to a determinate state. Update the progress below to see an example of this. (Re-show the progress indicator to return to indeterminate mode.)

string.name: cat_progress_indicator_hide
string.description: Button label to hide progress indicators [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_progress_indicator_show
string.description: Button label to show progress indicators [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_progress_indicator_update
string.description: Button label to update progress value on the progress indicators [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_progress_indicator_determinate_progress_prompt
string.description: Prompt for a text field that will take a number between 0 and 100 and apply that as the progress for progress indicators [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Enter an integer value from 0 to 100 to change progress in determinate mode:

string.name: cat_progress_indicator_deteriminate_progress_hint
string.description: Hint for a text field that will take a number between 0 and 100 and apply that as the progress for progress indicators [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_progress_indicator_set_to_determinate_mode
string.description: Set the displayed progress indicators to the determinate mode. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
